resources.string: Click here to continue to Home activity

\t\t\tSrijan Motorsports Incorporated is a leading name in India as a manufacturer of Formula race cars. The company is a home to innovators with a vision and passion in race car design and manufacturing. For almost a decade now, the company has been relentlessly working on producing Formula cars to meet the expectations of the people passionate about Formula racing. So far, we have successfully launched 6 successive models of race cars.
We are all set to launch its latest model, TSI-17.

\t\t\tOur model, TSI-17, comes in two chief variations namely, TSI-17 SE and TSI-17 KE. Along with this, we are giving our customers a chance to “cook up their own race car”. This allows you to choose different car components from among the variants provided by us.

\t\t\tAs a Formula car manufacturing company, we are not just interested in making cars but we aim to change the scenario of Motorsports racing in our country. With Srijan Formula Challenge, we aim to bring together all racing enthusiasts who share the same passion for race cars. This would provide a platform to all budding racers to test their mettle in the national arena.\n\n\t\t\tWe would be organising a minimum of 24 races annually with at least 2 races being held each month on the tracks of Kari Motor Speedway, Coimbatore, and MMSC Chennai, Tamil Nadu. In addition to the enthralling experience, the winner and the participants are in for exciting rewards and prizes.

Professional or amateur. If you are looking for a car to meet the standard of your dream car that would set the tracks on fire, here is your stop! This model launched by our company is the epitome of innovation and engineering and does true justice to your passion.
KTM Duke 390cc Engine (42 Bhp), Quaife Limited Slip Differential, Chain drive), paddle shifter
Tubular Space frame chassis. 1020 AISI Mild steel
Double wishbone with Ohlins TTX36 damper, 10\” OZ racing wheels, 10\” Hoosier tires.
Carbon fiber bodyworks with CFRP seats and steering wheel.
In board Data Acquisition System with tunable ECU (5 Preloaded Maps).

If you like tinkering with equipments in your garage and tweaking your car as per wishes, we present the perfect model for you. TSI-17 KE.
This model gives a chance to owners to work on their own car!
 The company provides all the standard, basic components in the form of a kit along with a complete tool set and a manual and it is upto the owner to build the car as per his whims! You also have a consulting engineer of our company at your disposal to help you build your dream car and get her roaring in the street.
TSI-17 KE saves us assembly time as well as the transportation cost; so this model goes easy on the your wallet.
